pkgmetadata.longdescription: Individual and Group Farm Sustainability Assessments using the IDEA4 Method // Collection of tools to automate the processing of data collected though the IDEA4 method (see Zahm et al. (2018) doi:10.1051/cagri/2019004 ). Starting from the original data collecting files this packages provides functions to compute IDEA indicators, draw modern and aesthetic plots, and produce a wide range of reporting materials.
